items.text: [번역 필요] States with larger populations get more representatives in the House.
[번역 필요] (because) some states have more people
[번역 필요] The number of representatives is directly related to how many people live in each state.
[번역 필요] decides if a law goes against the Constitution
[번역 필요] The judicial branch has the power of judicial review to determine if laws are constitutional.
[번역 필요] Fire protection and safety services are typically provided by state and local governments.
[번역 필요] approve zoning and land use
[번역 필요] States have the authority to regulate land use and zoning within their boundaries.
[번역 필요] Everyone in the U.S. has the right to practice any religion or no religion.
[번역 필요] the right to bear arms
[번역 필요] The Second Amendment protects the right to keep and bear arms.
[번역 필요] started the first free libraries
[번역 필요] Franklin founded the first subscription library in America, which became the model for free public libraries.
[번역 필요] The 13 stripes represent the 13 original colonies that declared independence.
